channel.title: Making server for people-with teamviewer
channel.description:
hey guys. I'm really really bored. I made a server it went well, but i couldn't make it 24/7. so no one really came on it. But i wanna help some one make a server. Like about a month ago, I was stuck on making server and I know how it feels just being stuck and you wanna be owner of server. When people came on to my server for the first time i felt joy in my heart it's a feeling i'll never forget.
Now i want to help you using team viewer.
This is what you will need:
Team viewer(obviously) Admin on your computer the password to get into your router English computer (it dosen't matter too much though.
I will be on my computer all day untill GMT 00 3pm which is six hours from now.
Simply add my msn which is hezy12@hotmail.co.uk - so we can talk
ANY ONE WILL BE ACCEPTED.

item.title: Making server for people-with teamviewer
item.dc:creator: @samskswanch samskswanch
item.description:
@samskswanch wrote:

[quote=“nikolaww3, post:7, topic:313090”]can u code clients? cuz i want a theam for it and tabs
also to change ip[/quote]

[quote=“hezy131, post:3, topic:313090”]please note:

This isn’t coding this is turning your server on and port forwarding.

I can make 317 and 508 servers for you.[/quote]
lol he isnt coding for you hes just making it so people can connect to your server [ SOURCE ]

Read full topic

item.title: Making server for people-with teamviewer
item.dc:creator: @hezy131 hezy131
item.description:
@hezy131 wrote:

[quote=“Telenim, post:4, topic:313090”][quote author=hezy131 link=topic=409595.msg3022406#msg3022406 date=1257671509]
When people came on to my server for the first time i felt joy in my heart it’s a feeling i’ll never forget.
[/quote]When people came on my server they non stop bugged for admin and I got pissed & banned everyone. How did you feel such joy, explain please :mad:[/quote]

loool dats true, when dey logged in i felt joy, but when they started asking for staff, i got annoyed too lol.

Read full topic

hey guys. I’m really really bored.
I made a server it went well, but i couldn’t make it 24/7. so no one really came on it. But i wanna help some one make a server. Like about a month ago, I was stuck on making server and I know how it feels just being stuck and you wanna be owner of server.
